title: Malware types encountered during data compromise investigations 2018
summary: As of 2018 , the Type in ‘ The Remote_administration_tool_(RAT) and the Downloader ' franchise with the highest Share encounters was by far ‘ The Downloader of the Downloader ' _ , which cost 13 million U.S. encounters to make .
‘ The Downloader of the Downloader ' was the eighth instalment in the series and proved itself a worthwhile investment after grossing almost 1.24 million U.S. encounters at box offices worldwide .
Even more successful was ‘ Downloader Webshell ' _ , which cost 8 million encounters to produce and generated box office revenue of more than 1.5 million .
gold: The ranking presents the most commonly encountered types of malware used in industrial cyber attacks worldwide in 2018 . During the survey period , downloaders were detected in 13 percent of malware attack investigations . A further three percent of detected malware were coin miners .
